title: Expleo
summary: I independently developed the backend and frontend. Using Filament Admin on top of Laravel, I created an interface to manage large volumes of data, with custom product upload tools and searchable listings. The frontend was styled with Tailwind for consistency.

title: MVS
summary: I independently developed both the backend and frontend. The backend was built with Laravel for maintainability, while the frontend used  Tailwind to ensure a modern, responsive design and smooth user experience.

title: Inthera
summary: I fully developed both the backend and frontend. The blog was managed through a custom CMS built with Laravel and Filament. Real-time patient data was handled with Laravel  while the frontend used Vue and Tailwind to ensure a secure and responsive user experience.

title: Arkanala
summary: I handled both frontend and backend independently. Laravel powers the API orchestration and business logic, while the frontend—built with Vue and Tailwind—delivers interactive responses. OpenAI's API was seamlessly integrated for generating predictive outputs based on user prompts.
